amendment.description: Manager's amendment makes technical and clarifying changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-409 to make technical changes to the underlying bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fincher amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Fincher.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fincher amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
